com.dsp

Class DspFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dsp.DspFactory

  • public class DspFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This is used to seed and initialize each page request with the required PageContext, similar to JspFactory.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DspFactory(com.dsp.servlet.DspServlet servlet)
      Constructor.

      Return information about this JSP/DSP engine.
      PageContext getPageContext(Servlet servlet, ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response, java.lang.String errorPageURL, boolean needsSession, int buffer, boolean autoflush)
      Return a new PageContext object for the page.

      Return the prop object for a given URL.

      Return a unique identifier using a 2 character rotating algorithm.

      Used internally by DspServlet for top level requests only.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DspFactory

        public DspFactory(com.dsp.servlet.DspServlet servlet)
        Constructor. Used only by DspServlet.

    • Method Detail

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Called by DspServlet when it's destroy() is called.

      • getDefaultFactory

        public static DspFactory getDefaultFactory()
        Find the factory object. This is called automatically by each DSP page.

      • getEngineInfo

        public JspEngineInfo getEngineInfo()
        Return information about this JSP/DSP engine.

      • getProp

        public DspProp getProp(java.net.URL url)
                throws DspException,
                       java.io.IOException
        Return the prop object for a given URL. This is called automatically by each DSP page.
        Throws:
        DspException
        java.io.IOException

      • getPageContext

        public PageContext getPageContext(Servlet servlet,
                         ServletRequest request,
                         ServletResponse response,
                         java.lang.String errorPageURL,
                         boolean needsSession,
                         int buffer,
                         boolean autoflush)
        Return a new PageContext object for the page. This is automatically called by each DSP page.

      • getServletLog

        public ServletLog getServletLog()

      • getUnique

        public static java.lang.String getUnique(java.lang.String prefix)
        Return a unique identifier using a 2 character rotating algorithm. This is used to create unique variable names during compilation of DSP pages.

      • releasePageContext

        public void releasePageContext(DspPageContext pc)
        Release the PageContext. Called automatically by each DSP page to place the PageContext back to the pool, so it may be used on future requests.

      • releaseFinal

        public void releaseFinal(DspPageContext pc)
        Used internally by DspServlet for top level requests only.
